channel.title: Judy Foote
channel.description: Recent news about Judy Foote, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by VOCM
item.description:
MP says Residents Concerned about Fracking
The Liberal MP for Random-Burin-St. George's says residents in the riding are very concerned with fracking - and Judy Foote says it makes her nervous, too. She told VOCM Open Line with Bill Rowe she recently met with members of the Fracking Awareness ...

item.title: Mentioned by Harbour Breton Coaster
item.description:
Residents mark 40th anniversary of landslide
MP Judy Foote (5th from l) presented a Thank-You Plaque to the organizers of the Commemoration Service (from l): Tanya Rogers, Mildred Augot, Jane Hunt, Doug Wells and Jamie Hunt. Susie Skinner was also a member of the organizing committee.

item.title: Mentioned by Southern Gazette
item.description:
Serving up a good time
Marystown Mayor Sam Synard and MP Judy Foote were called to cut the 'Marystown Day Cake' and serve up portions to local residents. George Macvicar Photo. Published on August 5, 2013. Published on August 5, 2013. Tweet. The annual Marystown Day ...

item.title: Mentioned by Clarenville Packet
item.description:
Question mark
Newfoundland and Labrador has a new representative in Ottawa, and Judy Foote, the MP for Random-Burin-St. George's, says she's not sure what to expect from him. “I will be watching and interested in how he handles that responsibility, and how open he is ...

item.title: Mentioned by Southern Gazette
item.description:
Unpaid work for young people becoming a problem
MP Judy Foote believes the Harper government must do more to prevent young people from being taken advantage of in the work place. Topics : Canada. The Member for Random-Burin-St. George's indicated there are currently more than 100,000 young ...

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Vote to bolster funeral fund for veterans fails
Liberal MP Judy Foote introduced a private member's bill to change the criteria. Her motion, which would have expanded and enhanced access to the fund, was voted on in late May. Liberal MP Judy Foote is blaming the Conservative government for denying ...

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Thanks to the voters of Random-Burin-St.George's for returning me to office. I will continue to work hard to represent your interests.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Polls are open until 830 tonight, bring 2 pieces of I-D, 1 with a photo. Let me know if you need a ride, or questions on voting. Please vote

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Tomorrow is Election Day! Polls open from 830am to 830pm. Bring 2 pieces of ID with an address & photo. I respectfully ask for your support.
